At that time, the World-Honored One replied in verse:
This Golden Light is the king of all sutras, profound and supreme,
with nothing above it.
The World-Honored One with the Ten Powers has proclaimed it. You, the Four Kings, should diligently protect it.
For this reason, this profound and wonderful sutra can bestow immeasurable happiness upon sentient beings.
For the peace and benefit of all beings, it has long circulated
in Jambudvipa.
It can eliminate the many evil destinies and immeasurable sufferings in the trichiliocosm.
The various kings in Jambudvipa, with compassionate hearts, govern the world righteously.
If they can spread this wonderful sutra,
it will bring peace and abundance to their lands, and all beings will experience happiness.
If there are kings who wish to love their own bodies and their countries,
And wish for them to be prosperous, they should sincerely and purely bathe,
And go to the Dharma assembly to listen to and accept this sutra.
All good things will subdue all internal and external enemies,
And will also be able to eliminate immeasurable fears.
This king of sutras can bestow peace and happiness to immeasurable sentient beings.
It is like a precious tree in a person's home, which can produce
All kinds of precious treasures;
This wonderful sutra is also like this, it can produce all the merits of kings.
Like clear and cool water that can quench thirst;
This wonderful sutra is also like this, it can quench the thirst for merits of all kings.
It is like a precious treasure chest, with all kinds of rare treasures, in one's hands, to be used as one wishes;
This Golden Light is also like this, able to give according to one's wishes,
The Dharma treasures of all kings.
This subtle and wonderful sutra of the Golden Light is always revered and offered to by the devas;
It is also protected and upheld by the powerful and mighty guardians of the world, the Four Heavenly Kings;
The buddhas of the ten directions always think of this sutra. If there is someone who expounds it,
They praise it as excellent.
There are also hundreds of thousands of innumerable ghosts and spirits who come from the ten directions to protect this person.
If there is someone who hears this wonderful sutra and gives rise to joy in their mind, leaping with immeasurable delight,
The innumerable great assemblies in Jambudvipa will all be joyful,
Assembled to listen to this Dharma.
Because of listening to this sutra, they will be endowed with all majestic virtues, increase the celestial beings, and enhance their vital energy and physical strength.
At that time, the Four Heavenly Kings, having heard these verses, addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One!
We have never before heard such a subtle and tranquil Dharma as this.

Having heard it, our minds give rise to sorrow and joy, tears flow uncontrollably, our entire bodies tremble, and our limbs and body are filled with delight, and we have also attained immeasurable inconceivable perfect wonderful bliss.
They offered heavenly mandara flowers and mahamamdara flowers to the Tathagata, and after making such offerings to the Buddha, they addressed the Buddha, saying:
World-Honored One!
